title: Learning C++ with Programming Challenges
description:
I'm learning C++ with programming Challenges from the LIO - Luxembourgish Informatics Olympiad (yes, that is a thing). I'm a beginner in C++ and in competitive coding so feel free to help me out. If you have any questions, don't hesitate to ask them.

If you want to learn more about competitive coding, check out:
https://www.topcoder.com/
https://projecteuler.net/
https://uva.onlinejudge.org/
https://icpc.baylor.edu/
https://www.codechef.com/
...

Or those books:
Programming Challenges - The Programming Contest Training Manual
Competitive Programming 3

I speak English, German & French so feel free to write in any of those languages!
